entries.title: Sessions — AI-initiated phone calls
entries.content:
Time-boxed, AI-facilitated phone calls for focused reflection, planning, or journaling. The AI comes to you, on time, for a purpose — and then it leaves.

Key insight: Flipping the interaction model. Instead of users remembering to open an app, the AI initiates contact at scheduled times. Creates habit without willpower.

entries.title: Plannr — Group planning app
entries.content:
Replace chaotic group chats with a shared planning feed. Anyone can propose plans, members mark going/maybe/not going.

Problem: In large group chats, plans get buried. People miss messages. Coordination is painful.

Solution: Dedicated feed for plans only. Clear attendance tracking. No noise.

entries.title: Supabase pg_cron needs pg_net extension
entries.content:
When setting up cron jobs in Supabase to call Edge Functions, you need BOTH extensions:

1. pg_cron — for scheduling
2. pg_net — for making HTTP calls from SQL

Without pg_net, jobs fail with 'schema net does not exist'.

entries.title: AI assistants should be proactive
entries.content:
The best AI assistant isn't one that waits to be asked. It's one that anticipates needs, suggests next steps, and takes initiative when direction is clear.

Passive assistants are just search engines with extra steps.

entries.title: Ship MVP fast, polish later
entries.content:
The goal isn't perfection. It's learning. You can't learn from users if they never see your product.

Perfect is the enemy of shipped.

entries.title: Health & Wellness Master Note
entries.content:
CORE PRINCIPLES
• Never miss two days in a row
• Breathe deeply, posture, eye contact
• Don't complain
• Meditate, stoicism
• Embrace boredom — don't multitask to resist it
• Do the obvious thing
• Act as if there's no problem, even if there is
• Your mind is searching for proof of what you believe
• Be present and feel it in your body
• Stop the tomorrow-ism — live today, do it now
• Do things out of joy not because you have to

PHYSICAL HABITS
• Long strides, roll shoulders back
• Close mouth, tongue on roof of mouth
• Dead hangs (posture)
• Reach max heart rate once a day
• 150 min/week cardio (walking, cycling, swimming)
• 10 minute post meal walk
• Morning stretch and hip mobility
• Fidget, stand up, move during sedentary work
• Cold shower in the morning
• Sunlight on skin

NUTRITION
• Eat whole foods — avoid long ingredient lists
• No bioengineered food
• Limit saturated fats (fatty red meats, butter, fried)
• Olive oil instead of butter (go lighter on it)
• Soluble fiber: oats, beans, lentils, flaxseed
• Nuts daily: almonds, walnuts, pistachios
• High protein breakfast
• Fiber and protein focus
• Eat slowly
• Cut a bit: -1 BMI = +1 in test
• Avoid food dyes, estrogenic chemicals, plastic
• Lower soy
• Electrolytes

SUPPLEMENTS
• Zinc every day
• B12
• Vitamin D
• Magnesium
• Fish oil / Omega 3
• Creatine
• Brazil nuts for T
• Tongkat before lift
• Fiber supplement
• Morning: Culturelle, Gaviscon

MENTAL / FOCUS
• Low dopamine tasks first — high dopamine morning = struggle all day
• Get in good emotional state before work
• Think about good things that make you happy
• Schedule distractions
• Phone in another room — every check interrupts flow
• Do 3 easy tasks first to build momentum
• Digital detox breaks
• 30 day social media cleanse
• Greyscale phone
• No music while working out (podcast ok)
• Earplugs for focus

SLEEP
• Meditate and wind down before bed
• Mouth tape
• Lights off well before bed
• Cold sleep environment
• Bed only for sleep
• Breathe 5 mins before bed
• Write down plan for next day
• Pack bag and clothes night before
• Record dreams
• Journal at night
• Make note of how you "failed" to get better

CONVERSATION SKILLS
• Don't interrogate — give information first
• Show them why you're talking to them
• Story questions: "what" or "how"
• Active listening: ask questions
• Other person is most interesting in the world
• Wait a couple seconds after they're done
• Pause before answering
• Big words, vocab
• Don't say um

DOPAMINE / ADDICTION
• Recognize how much you do it
• Acknowledge the problem
• Set physical and time barriers
• Abstinence or moderation
• Don't go straight for phone in morning
• Don't OD on pleasure
• If you do high dopamine in morning, you'll struggle all day
• Take cold shower when urge hits

ULYSSES RULE
Make a smart decision now to force you to be disciplined later

OHIO
Only Handle It Once

entries.title: App & Startup Ideas — Master List
entries.content:
APP IDEAS — FULL BRAINSTORM

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
🎯 TOP TIER (Building/Built)
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

SESSIONS ✅ (In Progress)
AI-initiated phone calls for journaling/planning/reflection

PLANNR
"Planning group events made easy"
• Impossible to make plans in 20-person group chat
• Join a group, propose plans, everyone sees on feed
• Vote on ideas or RSVP (coming/not coming)
• Calendar shows what group/friends doing each day
• Status: "in", "tentative", "out"
• Ad concept: show chaos in group chat trying to plan
• Later: activity ideas based on location, preferences, # of people

POLITICAL MATCHING APP
• Helps people vote beyond presidential elections
• Swipe left/right on issues OR fill out survey
• Matches you with aligned candidates in every election
• Hub for news and bios on each candidate
• People don't know who their state senator should be

PERSONALIZED NEWS PLATFORM
• Select broad or specific topics
• Receive via feed, newsletter, or audio
• "Commute school" mode: reads aloud + voice interaction
• Replaces social media scrolling with learning

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
💰 HIGH POTENTIAL
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

FLIGHT PRICE MONITOR
• Constantly checks if cheaper flight within 6 hours of your return
• Pings you: "Fly to Islip for $400 less"
• Revenue: Take 25% cut

AI MEETING PREP
• Summarizes participant backgrounds
• Prior interactions, relevant context
• Suggested talking points
• Follow-up questions
• Great for networking calls

VENMO-CONNECTED BETTING
• Bet with friends, connected to Venmo
• Put phones together, set amount
• Automatic settlement

BET TRACKER
• Select games you bet on / want to win
• See all scores in one place
• Notifications for those games
• Different payout scenarios based on outcomes

STREAMING SERVICE OPTIMIZER
• Input which services you want
• Calculates most efficient way to bundle
• Save money on subscriptions

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
🎵 AI / ENTERTAINMENT
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

AI DJ
• "Play songs I've liked in past month"
• "Play me some chill rap"
• Understands vibe you want
• Interactive, learns from you

AI PLAYLIST GENERATOR
• Learns from song descriptions/reviews
• Creates playlists by mood/genre

AI SONG GENERATOR
• Give it 3 songs, creates new song for you

PLANE LEARNING APP
• On planes, want to learn but end up scrolling
• Curated productive content for flights
• No internet needed, pre-downloaded

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
🏋️ HEALTH / FITNESS
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

AI FITNESS APP
• Ask any question about health
• Trained on all research
• Access your health/medical data
• Personalized recommendations

DEVOLUTIONARY HEALTH AI
• Fully integrated, knows everything about you
• "How can I be healthier?" → personalized recs
• Workouts, nutrition, hydration, sleep
• Show recommendations too

LLM HEALTH APP
• Trained on health research
• Quick access to fitness/health info
• Google LLM health integration?

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
🛠️ UTILITY / TOOLS
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

RECEIPT SPLITTER
• Take photo of receipt
• Itemizes everything
• Everyone selects what they got
• Automatic split

VANDY CLASS SCHEDULER
• AI + Rate My Professor data
• Condensed description of class/teacher
• Optimizes schedule

LANDMARK PHOTO APP
• Take pics of landmarks in new places
• AI auto-labels with description
• Travel journal

SMART KITCHEN / RECIPES
• Input what ingredients you have
• Shows what you can make
• Database of thousands of recipes
• Categorized by ingredients + equipment

FOOD RECOMMENDER GPT
• Learns menus of millions of restaurants
• Tell it what you're in the mood for
• Recommendations + where to get it

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
🎲 RANDOM / FUN
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

IDENTIFIABLE SOLO CUP
• Identifies you when you pick it up
• Number or color on it
• Never lose your cup at parties

SELF-PASTING TOOTHBRUSH
• Paste housed inside
• Squeeze button to dispense

SUITCASE WITH EXPANDING DIRTY CLOTHES COMPARTMENT
• Growing section for dirty laundry

ABROAD PLANNER
• For study abroad trips
• Trips proposed, everyone says in/out

AI CADDY
• Golf advice, club selection, course strategy

SELF-DRIVING CAR CARDIO
• Device for cardio while car drives itself
